modName: Brighid the Forsworn - an Alternate Start save game
summary: An alternate starting savegame that begins you in Druadach Redoubt or Lost Valley Redoubt.  Be a member of the Forsworn.  The Reach will be ours again!
descriptionHtml:
You are Forsworn.

You are Brighid, a Breton girl living in the Reach. Three years ago, your family was killed by corrupt Reach officials. You were taken in by the Forsworn, and since then you've lived among them. You know no other home. You have no other allegiance.

-------------

In this savegame:

-- Begin as a member of the Forsworn in either Lost Valley Redoubt or Druadach Redoubt.
-- Map markers disabled -- you'll have to uncover Skyrim yourself through exploration.
-- Slightly more Lore Friendly version starts you with a Bounty in the Reach and a Forsworn hairstyle. (Unfortunately, I'm not sure how to access the Forsworn warpaints, so I left those off.)
-- Begin at your own hay pile or bedroll, with a small barrel for your belongings. (Druadach Redoubt is empty; Lost Valley contains an extra Forsworn Sword, and a pair of Forsworn Gauntlets.)
-- File was made using only plugins for character creation.

The main quest is disabled, so bear in mind that if you venture to Helgen, things might be a bit interesting. (To enable the main quest post-Helgen, enter "setstage MQ102 30" into the console.)

Notes:

Download includes both .ess file and .skse file, because Brighid was built with RaceMenu. If you want her to look like she does in my images, you'll need:

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?]RaceMenu[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?]ApachiiSkyHair[/url] (including the 72 standalone female hairs)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49963/?]TrueEyes[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50307/?]TrueBrows[/url]

She'll load up with darker hair, but once you open up showracemenu, that should fix itself. (And yes, I see that neck seam I've got going on. I'm gonna fix that one of these days.)

I also have [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/7887/?]Pretty Face[/url] installed, but face textures are of course a personal preference. :)

If you download the save without RaceMenu, she'll come out a bit strangely, so make sure to use showracemenu to get her looking how you want!

-- Because this is a save file and not an actual mod, this won't alter the Cidhna Mine quest at all. Madanach won't know who you are -- but hey, most of them have been in prison a while; perhaps you simply never ran into each other.

-- I tagged this as NSFW because of the images in the Forsworn armor. Beyond the images I uploaded, there shouldn't be any adult content.

Installation:

-- Download and unzip into your Skyrim save games! (Both .ess and .skse file included.)
-- Please note that this is my first attempt at modding, so let me know if something doesn't work for you, and I'll try to fix it! (Or, you know, delete my files in a panic. Whichever.)

This mod was very much inspired by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1612719/?]Mshai's[/url] fabulous alternate start mod, [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6951/?]Theanna[/url].
author: anshela
